column4: hii i just find out that that transmission was not my problem. my internet was working OK! till i install ubuntu in speedtest.com it does not show me the right up or down speed can someone please help me i have only use ubuntu for 3 days so i dont know much about it
speedtest.com can vary greately from one day to the next depending on your isp also.

if you actual problem is 'torrent' speeds.. that can also vary greately - ive never really noticed a relable test - other then testing over several days at different sites/times and  seeing what averages out.
